Title: Long live the friendship of the parties of China and Albania, and the revolutionary struggle of the peoples of the two countries!
Designer: Wang Qingsheng (王庆生)Shu Chuanxi (舒传熹)Revolutionary Committee of Zhejiang Worker-Peasant-Soldier Fine Arts Academy (浙江工农兵美术大学革委会)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: Mao Zedong shaking hands with Albanian leader Enver Hoxha, who went to Beijing to meet Mao in 1956, but not during the Cultural Revolution.
